lyrics:
[Intro]
Come on walk with me
Take my hand
Ooooh, oooh oooh
Ooohh, oooh oooh
(Still water)
Still water
Ahhh, ahhh, ahh

[Verse 1]
Never you mind if I
Don't tell strangers passing by
If I don't brag
If I don't brag or boast
Click my glass and say a toast
About my love for you
How it runs so deep and true
And yet it's so
'Cause don't you know, ohh

[Chorus]
Still waters run deep
Still waters run deep
Still waters run deep
Still waters run deep
Ooooh
[Bridge]
Walk with me
Take my hand
Still waters

[Verse 2]
Still water
Walk with me
Take my hand
Whoa, whoa, whoa now
Still waters run deep
Hey, hey, hey, hey
Whoa, whoa, whoa now
Still waters run deep
